messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: positive comments about unschoolers (after 	sun herald board article)
messages.msgSnippet: I thought those comments were pretty good. Especially the criticism of what goes for news. ;) The  comments about unschooling were pretty open minded too. I
messages.messageBody:
I thought those comments were pretty good. Especially the criticism of
what goes for news. ;) The comments about unschooling were pretty
open minded too. I didn't get the feeling they wanted to know about
unschooling but they weren't dissing it either.

~Katherine

messages.subject: positive comments about unschoolers (after sun herald board article)
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to share this blog post that I stumbled apon this morning, I thought it was nice how the blogger and the other commenters defended unschooling. It was
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to share this blog post that I stumbled apon this morning, I
thought it was nice how the blogger and the other commenters defended
unschooling. It was interesting to see different POV on unschooling,
especially the positive ones.

xxmelissa
in italy
mamma di 7
--
lucia almost 23yr, lidia 19.5yr, matteo 15.25yr, raffaele 12.5yr,
elena shanti 9.75yr, giacomo leo 6.75yr and gioele 4.5y

"There is a Place beyond Rightness and Wrongness -- let us meet There."
§Rumi

www.nontogliermiilsorriso.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
